deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

onERC1238BatchMint(address,uint256[],uin.details: Handles the receipt of multiple ERC1238 token types. NOTE: To accept the transfer(s), this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1238BatchMint(address,address,uint256[],uint256[],bytes)"))`

params.amounts: An array containing amounts of each token being transferred (order and length must match ids array)
params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.ids: An array containing ids of each token being transferred (order and length must match values array)
params.minter: The address which initiated minting (i.e. msg.sender)

onERC1238Mint(address,uint256,uint256,by.details: Handles the receipt of a single ERC1238 token type. NOTE: To accept the transfer, this must return `bytes4(keccak256("onERC1238Mint(address,address,uint256,uint256,bytes)"))`

params.amount: The amount of tokens being transferred
params.data: Additional data with no specified format
params.id: The ID of the token being transferred
params.minter: The address which initiated minting (i.e. msg.sender)
